text: 17.51 Part 5 of the policy supports development proposals for arts or cultural facilities on meanwhile, pop-up or vacant sites where they BACK TO POLICIES bring into use vacant developable land on a temporary basis as long as they are within the specified locations in Part 5(a)(i) or can prove that they are serving a required need, that their scale is in keeping with the surroundings and that they will be easily accessible to the local community (Part 5(a)(ii)). They also must prevent or mitigate any adverse amenity impacts (Part 5(b)) and must not preclude the permanent use of the site for future development (part 5(c)). This policy looks to encourage arts and culture facilities on meanwhile, pop-up or vacant sites, as it is recognised that these facilities bring great social, community and placeshaping benefits. 302 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES 18.
